backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a footer content update feature to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-written summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling header, sections, and footer into the page layout.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Image gallery component rendering a responsive grid with optional hover titles.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Wrapper for page sections providing consistent spacing and container layout.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer showing branding, navigation, and dynamic contact details from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with smooth-scrolling navigation and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Centralized site text, highlights, gallery data, and contact information.
frontend/src/data/menu.ts: Menu data defining categories and items with names, descriptions, and prices.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, and logout methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for future React Query hooks when backend methods are added.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, theme variables, typography, and imported fonts.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/sections/AboutSection.tsx: Renders the About section with story, approach text, and a gallery sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/sections/ContactSection.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and displays business contact info from siteContent.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the landing hero with background image, logo, tagline, highlights, and a CTA to scroll to the menu.
frontend/src/sections/MenuSection.tsx: Renders menu categories and items from menuData with styled cards and pricing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, typography, plugins, and dark mode.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, feature requests, and current project state information.
